description: This file defines API routes for managing songs in a music backend application. It includes endpoints for listing all songs, uploading new songs, and streaming existing songs with support for HTTP Range requests. It features media path resolution, validation for MP3 files, and interactions with a database model 'Song' via SQLAlchemy. The code is part of a FastAPI application and relies on external modules for database session management and models.

methods.name: Path _media_root()
methods.description: Determines the absolute directory where media files are stored, considering environment variables and fallback mechanisms.

methods.name: None _json_404(detail: str)
methods.description: Raises a standardized 404 HTTP exception with JSON error details.

methods.name: Path _resolve_song_media_path(song_filename: str)
methods.description: Resolves the filesystem path for a stored song filename, with fallback checks to handle different deployment layouts.

methods.name: int _max_file_bytes()
methods.description: Returns the maximum allowed upload size from environment variables or default.

methods.name: str _sanitize_filename(name: str)
methods.description: Sanitizes filenames to keep only safe characters.

methods.name: Tuple[str,int] _validate_mp3(upload: UploadFile, content: bytes)
methods.description: Performs basic validation checks on uploaded MP3 files, including content type, extension, size, and magic header detection.

methods.name: Optional[Tuple[int,int]] _parse_range_header(range_header: str, file_size: int)
methods.description: Parses the HTTP Range header to determine byte ranges for streaming.

methods.name: Iterator[bytes] _iter_file_range(path: Path, start: int, end: int, chunk_size: int = 1024 * 1024)
methods.description: Yields chunks of a file within a specified byte range for streaming.

methods.name: List[SongResponse] list_songs(db: Session = Depends(db_session_dep))
methods.description: Returns a list of all songs in the library, ordered by creation date.

methods.name: SongUploadResponse upload_song( file: UploadFile = File(..., description="MP3 file upload (multipart/form-data)"), title: Optional[str] = Form(None, description="Optional title. Defaults to original filename stem."), artist: Optional[str] = Form(None, description="Optional artist. Defaults to 'Unknown Artist'."), )
methods.description: Handles MP3 file uploads, validates, stores on disk, and adds metadata to the database.

methods.name: stream_song(song_id: uuid.UUID, request: Request)
methods.description: Streams a song by its ID with support for HTTP Range requests, including path resolution and file validation.

ctags.name: _iter_file_range
ctags.pattern: /^def _iter_file_range(path: Path, start: int, end: int, chunk_size: int = 1024 * 1024) -> Iterato/
ctags.signature: (path: Path, start: int, end: int, chunk_size: int = 1024 * 1024)

ctags.name: upload_song
ctags.signature: ( file: UploadFile = File(..., description="MP3 file upload (multipart/form-data)"), title: Optional[str] = Form(None, description="Optional title. Defaults to original filename stem."), artist: Optional[str] = Form(None, description="Optional artist. Defaults to 'Unknown Artist'."), )
